Summary: I observed a star-like object in the morning sky. It moved one direction then changed; direction instantly. It moved very fast across the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I observed a star-like object in the morning sky at approximately 9:10 AM, Oct 8, 2011. It moved one direction then abruptly changed direction several time before instantly coming to a complete stop where it appeared to hover. The object did this several times. It was very high in the sky (approx. 60 degree off the horizon) and was bright like a star. It then moved very quickly across the sky and came to a complete stop where it again hovered. After it hovered for a few seconds, it disappeared. As an estimation of the speed of the object, we saw a high flying commercial airplane a few minutes after seeing the object. We estimated that the object was traveling 4-5 times faster than the commercial airplane.
